levels.description: Attack range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, and attacks strike <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> targets at once; enemy projectile speed in attack range is <@ba.vup>greatly reduced</>, and all projectiles are <@ba.vup>removed</> when the skill expires.
